fchen

类 Benchmark

  • java.lang.Object
    • fchen.Benchmark

  • public class Benchmark
extends java.lang.Object
    This class measure the performance of our verifiable outsourcing algorithm on a certain directory. The performance metric includes the storage for storing the file set and the prefix set, the outsource time, the query time, the search time, and the verification time.
    作者:
    Chen, Fei, Last Updating Date: 2015.08.03
